description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.20jNBiIIxaiOVyi0]{Oozemorph Dedication}

Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces. You gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed equal to your half your land Speed (minimum 5 feet). If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P04Hw8E6WAWARKHP]{Quick Climb} feat, your climb Speed is equal to your land Speed. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed}.
